title: pypy安装
zzzContent:
pypy 安装:

第一步:
apt-get install pypy
第二步:安装dist tools:
wget https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/d/distribute/distribute-0.6.tar.gz
tar -xzf ./distribute-0.6.tar.gz
cd distribute-0.6
pypy setup.py install
...
第三步:

wget https://raw.github.com/pypa/pip/master/contrib/get-pip.py
$ pypy distribute_setup.py
